Articles.Content:
Hello! This is where ill be posting my ships!

First off:

DS8 (im sure anybody know what that means)

DS8 is a large space station. its only got half a fuel tank left. its a bit hard to fly, but, its quite a good space station! (atleast in my opinion )

Required mods: Orbital Construction, Protboyne, , and BACE

DL: https://www.dropbox.com/s/amw2zg5ltznjape/DS8.craft?m

Spacedock 9:

A small space station that can eject.

easy to fly.

Thats eject pod. space station is a suprise

REQUIRED MODS: ANVIL ROCKET, Orbital construction, LH aerospace Solar Rover, and Kerblabl

Dl: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ht2r9m4nv81vvww/Spacedock%209.craft?m

Spacerace!

a small plane with ejection system.

Required mods: Mechjeb (like most of my others)

DL: https://www.dropbox.com/s/1aky02o51oteux1/Spacerace.craft?m

Promethus solar rover_OC

this is quite symple, no need for picture, its symply the MK2 promethus capsule attached to some fuel tanks and Orbital construction peices. (Jumpdrive)

DL: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ozjdjyq8bfux93n/Prometheus%20Capsule%20Mk2OC.craft?m

Thanks for visiting!

Edited August 30, 2012 by The Destroyer

Im also taking requests.

Also, mods.

Kerblabl: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/4110-RocktCo-Industries-Munar-Institute-of-Technology-Soyuz-and-Kerbabl-lander-v1?highlight=soyuz

OC: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/9283-0-16-0-Plugin-Orbital-Planetary-Construction-V9-3

Edited August 30, 2012 by The Destroyer
